titles.title: Stock Option Accounting Review Act
A bill to require a review of accounting treatment of stock option plans, and the establishment of an appropriate stock option accounting principle within 1 year.
Stock Option Accounting Review Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Stock Option Accounting Review Act - Amends the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to direct the Financial Accounting Standards Board to: (1) review the accounting treatment of employee stock options; and (2) within one year after the enactment of this Act, adopt an appropriate generally accepted accounting principle for the treatment of such options.
